Package uicontrollers.admin

Class AdminOverviewController

java.lang.Object
uicontrollers.admin.AdminOverviewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class AdminOverviewController extends Object implements Controller
This class serves as a controller for the administrator dashboard.css.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize()

    • initTopPanes

      private void initTopPanes()
      Initializes the topmost panes with general information of the application: - Total number of registered users - Upcoming events - Active bets - Money at stake

    • initRevenueChart

      private void initRevenueChart()
      Initializes the chart with the money balances of the last week. Includes: - Total money bet on events finished last month (with correct forecast alredady defined). - Total money earned by users last month. - Total money earned by BetAndRuin last month
